name: Kosmir
description:
This game was made for the manasoup game jam 2.

WASD to move

Space to attack

Unfortunately we didn't make the deadline, so we took another day to do a mini polish and publish it independently. Still , we consider it as a 3-day game jam entry. 

Programming by me: https://kitsomo.itch.io

Art by Tadashiro: https://tadashiro.itch.io 

You can also check the code here:  https://github.com/Chris-Bejko/manasoup-game-jam
